snippet.title: Lunar Axe - Teaser Trailer | PC [ENG]
snippet.description:
Coming to Steam 2021.
Alpha Itch.io: https://opsgames.itch.io/lunaraxe
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1305820/Lunar_Axe/
http://www.lunaraxe.com

Lunar Axe is a point-and-click adventure game with hidden object scenes, locations and storylines based on real stories with incredible hand-drawing art. You must solve puzzles and explore different environments to find a mystical weapon and solve the mystery behind earthquakes that are destroying the city.
